hero.title: Cyber Police: Synthetic Rebellion
hero.subtitle: A social deduction game in a cyberpunk megacity

about.description1: Welcome to a world where androids have escaped the control of megacorporations. In Cyber Police: Synthetic Rebellion, you must identify replicants, investigate cybercrimes, and fight for survival on the neon streets of the metropolis.
about.description2: The game combines Mafia mechanics with a cyberpunk setting, where each role has unique abilities, and digital attacks can change the course of the game. Be careful: even after death, players can influence events using viruses and network hacks.

hiddenRoles.title: Hidden Roles and Sabotage
hiddenRoles.description: Inspired by classic 'Mafia' and 'Town of Salem. Players don't know who is a Replicant and who is human

digitalAttacks.title: Digital Attacks
digitalAttacks.description: Intercept chats, falsify votes, post-mortem viruses

ghostInfluence.title: Influence After Death
ghostInfluence.description: Even the dead don't leave the game: Network Ghosts (humans) and viral programs (replicants)

multiplayer.title: Multiplayer and Voice Chat
multiplayer.description: Tactics, negotiations, and deception in real-time

whatIs.question: What is Cyber Police?
whatIs.answer: Cyber Police is a social deduction game where players must identify replicants, investigate cybercrimes, and fight for survival on the neon streets of the metropolis.

howToPlay.question: How do I play?
howToPlay.answer: Players form theories, accuse each other, use private chats.

roles.question: What are the roles?
roles.answer: Players don't know who is a Replicant and who is human

winning.question: How long does a game last?
winning.answer: About 20-30 minutes for an average group of 8-10 people.

mobile.question: Will there be a mobile version?
mobile.answer: Yes, a cross-platform implementation is planned.

systemRequirements.question: What are the system requirements?
systemRequirements.answer: Only a browser is needed (MVP version) or a lightweight client, details to follow.

preparation.title: Game Preparation
preparation.description: Players are assigned secret roles as either Cyber Police or Syndicate Replicants. Each role has unique abilities that can be used during the game.

dayPhase.title: Day Phase: Investigation
dayPhase.description: During the day, all players discuss, share information, and try to identify the Replicants. Use private chats and digital tools to gather intelligence.

nightPhase.title: Night Phase: Covert Operations
nightPhase.description: At night, Replicants choose their targets while the Cyber Police use their abilities to protect citizens and gather evidence.

votingPhase.title: Voting Phase: Justice
votingPhase.description: Players vote to eliminate a suspected Replicant. Be careful - the Syndicate can hack the voting system to manipulate results.

roles.title: Game Roles
roles.description: Each player is secretly assigned one of these roles at the start of the game. Use your abilities wisely to help your team win.

detective.name: Neural Detective
detective.description: A seasoned investigator with advanced neural implants for detecting Replicants.
detective.abilities: Can scan one player per night to determine if they are a Replicant.

hacker.name: Rogue Hacker
hacker.description: A skilled netrunner who can manipulate digital systems.
hacker.abilities: Can intercept private messages and falsify voting results.

netrunner.name: Security Netrunner
netrunner.abilities: Can protect one player from hacking attempts each night.

informant.name: Street Informant
informant.description: Has connections throughout the city's underground.
informant.abilities: Can investigate a player's recent activities each night.

infiltrator.name: Syndicate Infiltrator
infiltrator.description: A Replicant spy embedded within the police force.
infiltrator.abilities: Can appear as human to scans and investigations.

mastermind.name: Syndicate Mastermind
mastermind.description: The leader of the Replicant uprising.
mastermind.abilities: Can eliminate one player each night and coordinate Syndicate actions.
